Pour vinegar mixture over chicken. Add bay leaves. Reduce heat to low, cover skillet and simmer until chicken is just cooked through, about 10 minutes. Using tongs, transfer chicken to plate. Boil pan juices 2 minutes. Season to taste with salt. Spoon over chicken, discarding bay leaves. Serve with rice. ; name: hawaiian chicken white rice made simple ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, flour, soy sauce, sugar, pineapple chunk, parsley, white rice, parsley sprig ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. For best results turn chicken over half way through cooking. ; name: one dish chicken rice bake ; ingredients: cream soup, water, white rice, paprika, pepper, boneless chicken breast halves ; preparation:Mix soup, water, rice, paprika, and pepper in 2-qt. Bake at 375 f for 45 minutes or until done. ; name: asian garlic chicken ; ingredients: distilled white vinegar, low sodium chicken broth, garlic, soy sauce, ground pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, herb seasoning mix, oriental sesame oil, bay leaves, cooked white rice ; preparation:Whisk vinegar, chicken broth, garlic, soy sauce and pepper in small bowl to blend. Serve with rice. ; name: hawaiian chicken white rice made simple ; ingredients: chicken breast halves, flour, soy sauce, sugar, pineapple chunk, parsley, white rice, parsley sprig ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees.

<|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: chicken and roasted pepper skewers ; ingredients: mayonnaise, roasted red pepper, garlic clove, boneless skinless chicken breast ; preparation:Soak 12 eight inch skewers in water for 30 minutes. Grill over medium heat. ; name: grilled chicken skewers with red pepper pesto ; ingredients: roasted red peppers,

name: blue cheese salad ; ingredients: sour cream, mayonnaise, dry mustard, oregano, fresh ground black pepper, blue cheese, garlic oil, lemon juice, fresh spinach ; preparation:Heat large non-stick skillet, swirl in oil, then add garlic. Remove from oven and serve immediately. ; name: blue cheese butter ; ingredients: blue cheese, butter, garlic powder, onion powder ; preparation:In a small saucepan, saute walnuts until tender. Stir together salt, pepper, chili powder, cumin and cinnamon. Coat the pork with the lime beer marinade. Spoon the seasoning over the pork. Return the meat to the oven and roast for 30 minutes longer, until the internal temperature is 160 to 165. Remove from the oven, cover loosely with foil and let rest for at least 10 minutes. Thinly slice the meat and arrange on platters. Pour any juices over the meat. Garnish with rosemary springs. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: roasted pork tenderloin with garlic ; ingredients: pork loin, garlic, salt, pepper, butter, onion, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. name: pumpkin cream pie ; ingredients: powdered sugar, cream cheese, butter, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, canned pumpkin, 9-inch graham cracker crust, sugar, heavy cream ; preparation:Beat first 5 ingredients together until fluffy, 1-2 minutes. Bake the apples for 25 minutes or until tender, then set aside for 10 minutes for the sauce to thicken slightly. Serve with the sauce spooned over the apples with cream or icecream. ; name: the best pumpkin pie ever ; ingredients: deep dish pie shells, pumpkin puree, sweetened condensed milk, eggs, cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 425f. Store in ziplock bag. ; name: orange cocoa ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, water, milk, orange rind, vanilla ; preparation:In a large saucepan, stir together the cocoa and sugar. Add water. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Allow to boil for two minutes, still stirring. Add milk and orange peel and heat to serving temperature. Add vanilla and serve. ; name: orange julius with the secret ingredient ; ingredients: oranges, ice, water, milk, powdered coffee creamer, sugar ; preparation:Add ice and water to blender and turn on high for a few seconds. Add orange sections about 5 at a time, blending a little as you go. Add the other ingredients in whatever order and blend until smooth. Taste. Add more creamer or sugar if necessary. I use small to medium size seedless, sweet oranges. ; name: apricot and brandy jam ; ingredients: dried apricot halves, water, orange, sugar, almond extract, brandy ; preparation:Combine apricots and water in a bowl, cover, and let stand overnight, or until soft and well plumped. Combine apricots and their soaking water in saucepan with the orange peel and juice and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the sugar and bring to boil, while stirring. Boil gently, stirring often, until the mixture is thick and shiny and begins to clear the sides of the pan when stirred. While mixture thickens, be sure to stir it continually but gently, so that the fruit does not burn or get squashed. Do not allow the mixture to cook down to a puree. It should retain good-sized bits of apricot. Remove the preserve from heat and stir in almond extract and brandy. Ladle into 3 half-pint canning jars, prepared in usual manner and seal with sterilized 2 piece screw-on lids. Cool and let mellow several weeks or more before serving. ; name: liqueur oranges ; ingredients: oranges, caster sugar, vanilla bean, orange-flavored liqueur, brandy ; preparation:In a large saucepan, stir together the liqueur and brandy. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares. ; name: deep dish chocolate brownies ; ingredients: margarine, white sugar, vanilla, eggs, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, beat the margarine, white and brown sugar together until fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla, beat well. In another bowl, sift flour, baking powder, and salt. Add to the creamed mixture, stirring well. Fold in butter brickle bits, and chocolate chips. Spread in a greased 9x13-inch pan. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Can be frosted with chocolate frosting. ; name: quick and easy brownies ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, flour, vanilla, cocoa powder, margarine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, sugar, salt, and cocoa in a bowl until they are blended well. Cut the shortening into the dry ingredients as you would into a pie crust dough. Add the eggs and vanilla and mix until dough is moist. The batter will be stiff. Pour into a greased pan and bake at 350 until a toothpick comes out clean. I use an 8 x 8 pan because i like thick brownies. I bake them between 25- 30 minutes. A 9 x 13 pan would bake between 20- 25 minutes. ; name: rocky road brownies ; ingredients: egg whites, egg, white sugar, vanilla extract, cocoa, baking powder, salt, all-purpose flour, marshmallow cream, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. name: pineapple cookies ; ingredients: shortening, brown sugar, white sugar, crushed pineapple, vanilla, eggs, salt, baking soda, all-purpose flour, baking powder ; preparation:Cream shortening and the sugars. Add egg and pineapple. Stir in vanilla. Sift flour, then measure it. To the flour, add salt, soda, and baking powder. Add dry mixture to the wet mixture. Drop by rounded tsps. Onto a lightly greased baking sheet. Bake 10-12 minutes at 350f, or until done. ; name: pineapple cheese bread ; ingredients: self-rising flour, sugar, crushed pineapple in juice, eggs, vegetable oil, sharp cheddar cheese, pecans, pineapple extract ; preparation:Using a large mixing bowl, sift the flour and sugar and mix together. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: raspberry currant jam ; ingredients: red currants, water, red raspberries, sugar ; preparation:Wash the currants and put them in a sauce pan with the water. Cover the pot and bring to a boil, stirring gently, until the currants are all popped. Press them through a sieve, and reserve the puree. Discard the skins, stems and seeds. Gently rinse the raspberries and drain them well. Mix the currant puree, raspberries and sugar in a large pot. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly, until the sugar dissolves. Boil hard until the mixture almost reaches the gell stage, about 20 minutes. Stir occasionally to prevent sticking. Remove from the heat and skim. Seal in sterilized jars. Put in a boiling water bath for 5 minutes. ; name: cherry currant jam ; ingredients: sour pitted cherries, red currants, water, sugar ; preparation:Pit the cherries, and chop them roughly if desired. Discard the skins, stems and seeds. Mix the currant puree, cherries, and sugar in a large pot. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly, until the sugar dissolves. Boil hard until the mixture reaches the gell stage, about 20 minutes. Remove from the heat and skim. Seal in sterilized jars. Process in boiling water for 5 minutes. ; name: stewed blackberries ; ingredients: blackberry, water, salt, sugar ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees. Prepare pastry. name: grilled formaggio sandwiches ; ingredients: olive oil, focaccia bread, scamorza cheese, fresh spinach leaves, bacon ; preparation:To prepare each sandwich, spread 1 teaspoon of the olive oil on one side of each slice of bread. Place 2 slices cheese, three to four spinach leaves and 1 tablespoon cooked bacon between unbuttered sides of two bread slices. Place one sandwich in a large frypan or on a griddle. Cook over medium high heat for 3 to 4 minutes on eaach side or till the cheese is melted and the bread is golden brown. If necessary to prevent overbrowning, reduce to medium or brush on extra margarine, butter or olive oil. Repeat for remaining sandwiches. ; name: sandwich of the day by faiza ; ingredients: sandwich bread, meatloaf, mayonnaise, red pepper jelly ; preparation:To prepare each sandwich, spread 1 teaspoon of the olive oil on one side of each slice of bread. name: grilled summer squash ; ingredients: summer squash, onion, fresh ground pepper, garlic powder, salt, butter, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat grill. Arrange veggies on a piece of aluminum foil large enought to form a packet. Sprinkle pepper, garlic powder, & salt over veggies. Slice butter into desired pieces and place on top of veggies. Drizzle with olive oil. Seal packet leaving enough room for veggies to steam. Place on grill for approximately 20 minutes or until veggies are soft and flip packet as necessary for even cooking. ; name: grilled thai marinated summer squash ; ingredients: zucchini, summer squash, reduced-sodium vegetable broth, lime juice, of fresh mint, fresh basil, gingerroot, jalapeno, reduced sodium soy sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Place thai marinated summer squash in a large bowl. Mix dressing ingredients in a small bowl, stream in the extra-virgin olive oil and beat dressing with a fork. Pour dressing into the food storage bag and seal bag. Coat the vegetables evenly with dressing then grill vegetables a couple of minutes on each side until marked and tender. Arrange on a small platter. ; name: squashed cabbage ; ingredients: cabbage, zucchini, onion, garlic cloves, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add cabbage, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately. ; name: roasted red bell pepper zucchini yellow squash ; ingredients: zucchini, yellow squash, red bell pepper, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper, balsamic vinegar, pine nuts, fresh basil leaves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. Heat 2 large roasting pans in the oven for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, in a large bowl, toss the zucchini with the olive oil and crushed red pepper. Season generously with salt and pepper. Spread the zucchini on the hot pans and roast for 30 minutes without stirring, until the rounds are tender and their bottom are golden. Transfer to a platter, garnish with mint and serve. ; name: summer squash stir fry ; ingredients: vegetable oil, zucchini, summer squash, red bell pepper, dried italian seasoning, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat a large skillet or wok over high heat. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: mustard pretzels ; ingredients: small pretzels, prepared mustard, honey, cider vinegar, dry mustard ; preparation:Combine the mustard, honey, sugar and vinegar in a saucepan and whisk to mix. Transfer to a serving bowl and serve warm or at room temperature. The glaze will keep, tightly covered in the refrigerator, for several weeks. ; name: sweet n hot mustard dip ; ingredients: honey, vinegar, eggs, ground mustard, salt, pretzels ; preparation:In a small bowl, beat the honey, vinegar, eggs, ground mustard, salt, pretzels until smooth. Gradually beat in honey, vinegar, eggs, ground mustard, salt, pretzels. Add eggs and mix well. Add remaining ingredients. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly until thick. Serve hot over sweet n hot mustard dip. Refrigerate leftover sauce to use for sandwiches. ; name: mustard and dill asparagus ; ingredients: asparagus, lemon juice, olive oil, dijon mustard, dried dill weed, garlic, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. In a shallow dish, toss the asparagus, olive oil and salt and pepper together. Lay the asparagus in one level layer. Place in oven and roast, uncovered for approximately 10 minutes, or until the asparagus is just tender. Transfer to a serving plate. Whisk the lemon juice, lemon zest, dill, olive oil and honey together in a small bowl. Top the asparagus with some of the dressing and keep the rest on the side. ; name: sweet hot mustard ; ingredients: dry mustard, sugar, vinegar, salt, egg, miracle whip ; preparation:Mix dry mustard and vinegar and let stand overnight in a closed container. I use a glass mason jar and lid. The next day, in a glass saucepan beat egg. Mix in sugar, salt and mustard mixture. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly with wire whisk, until mixture thickens and just begins to bubble. Take off heat. Let cool approximately 30 minutes. Then stir in miracle whip. Keep in a sealed container in the refrigerator. Will keep in the refrigerator for up to two months. Great sandwich spread. It also works well as a dip for sausage or pepperoni sticks at a party. ; name: mustard dill pretzel dip ; ingredients: sugar, olive oil, mayonnaise, stone ground mustard, prepared mustard, garlic powder, dill weed ; preparation:Combine the mustard, mayonnaise, stone ground mustard, prepared mustard, garlic powder, dill weed in a saucepan and whisk to mix. name: sea scallops in sweet pepper sauce ; ingredients: sea scallops, butter, sweet pepper, onion, garlic, dry white wine, chicken broth, milk, fresh parsley ; preparation:In lg skillet, melt butter and cook scallops for about 7 minutes, until golden brown. Remove and keep warm. In same skillet, add pepper, onion and garlic. Cook 2 minutes. Add wine, stir 1 minute. Add broth, milk, and parsley. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until sauce thickens, 1-2 minutes. Add scallops and heat through. ; name: seafood in lemon cream sauce ; ingredients: king prawns, scallops, olive oil, garlic cloves, asparagus, sugar snap peas, lemon juice, dry white wine, cream, parsley ; preparation:Shell and devein prawns. Into a medium bowl combine prawns, scallops, oil and garlic. Cook seafood on a heated oiled grill plate until changed in colour, remove and keep warm. Boil, steam or microwave asparagus and sugar snap peas, separately until tender. Drain and cover to keep warm. Simmer juice and wine in a small saucepan, uncovered, about 1 minute or until reduced by half. Add cream and bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer uncovered for 2 minutes. Add seafood and simmer uncovered until hot. Serve seafood with vegetables and garnish with the parsley. ; name: spiced beef stir fry with scallions and cilantro ; ingredients: filet of beef, peanut oil, rice wine, soy sauce, cilantro, scallion, ground cumin, dried chili pepper flakes, ground black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:In a large wok or nonstick frying pan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Stir in broth and soy sauce and cook just until simmering. Top with fish. ; name: fish fillet and scallops in green peppercorn sauce ; ingredients: fresh boneless fish fillets, butter, lemon rind, scallops, green peppercorn, lemon juice, salt and black pepper ; preparation:In a large wok or nonstick frying pan, heat oil over medium-high heat. name: cream cheese cheddar biscuits ; ingredients: unbleached all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, sharp cheddar cheese, butter, cream cheese, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Measure dry ingredients into food processor and pulse until well combined. Add cheese and cut butter and cream cheese into small chunks and distribute throughout processor bowl. Hit pulse about 10 times for 1-2 seconds each pulse until course crumbs develop. Pour milk through feed tube in a slow stream while pulsing until cohesive but crumbly dough forms. Turn dough onto floured surface and gently squeeze it into a ball. Flatten and gently shape into an 8 by 8 inch square. Cut into 16 even squares. Place on ungreased baking sheet and bake 15-18 minutes until lightly browned. ; name: paula deen s cheese biscuits ; ingredients: self-rising flour, baking powder, sugar, vegetable shortening, cheddar cheese, buttermilk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees f. name: delicious vegetable beef soup ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, garlic, dried italian herb seasoning, stewed tomatoes, beef broth, frozen mixed vegetables, conchiglie, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a soup pot or large saucepan, cook the ground beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat, stirring often, for about 8 minutes. name: grilled eggplant aubergine and pepper sandwiches ; ingredients: green sweet peppers, eggplant, olive oil, french bread, soft fresh goat cheese, dijon-style mustard ; preparation:Quarter the sweet peppers lengthwise. Remove and discard the stems, seeds and membranes. Brush eggplant slices with oil, grill eggplant slices and sweet pepper quarters on the rack of an uncovered grill directly over medium hot coals for 4 minutes, or broil. Turn and grill 3 to 5 minutes more or till eggplant slices are tender and sweet peppers are slightly charred. Remove veggies from grill, set aside. Spread one side of each french bread slice with goat cheese and mustard. Layer three eggplant slices and two sweet pepper quarters on each of four bread slices. Top with remaining bread slices. Serve warm. ; name: eggplant aubergine and tomato sandwiches ; ingredients: egg, water, eggplant, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, garlic clove, fresh thyme, tomatoes, french bread ; preparation:Beat egg and water together and brush it on the eggplant slices. Mix garlic and thyme into mayonnaise and spread on bread. Layer the eggplant and tomato slices on bread. Slice sandwich into 4 sections and serve. ; name: roasted eggplant aubergine spread ; ingredients: eggplants, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, roasted red pepper, small caper, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Prick eggplant once with a knife. Place on a baking sheet and roast until the skin is wrinkled and eggplant has collapsed, about one hour. Remove and set aside until cool enough to handle. Serve with pita toasts. ; name: baked creole eggplant aubergine ; ingredients: eggplants, onion, shrimp, celery, butter, creole seasoning, salt & freshly ground black pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Boil eggplants until soft. name: omelet ; ingredients: eggs, garlic salt, chicken broth, mozzarella cheese, cooking spray ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with non-stick cooking spray. Cut into wedges and serve warm. ; name: oven omelette ; ingredients: eggs, milk, salt, pepper, frozen hash browns, ham, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Bake at 325 for about 30-35 minutes or until eggs are set but still moist. ; name: oven baked omelet ; ingredients: eggs, milk, all-purpose flour, salt, ground pepper, cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Pour the eggs into the pan and cook for an omelet, lifting the cooked part of the eggs to allow the uncooked part to run under, and shaking the pan when the bottom starts to set. Whisk together the olive oil, balsamic vinegar, thyme, garlic, salt, pepper and brown sugar. Cut the tomatoes in half and toss to combine with the olive oil mixture. Spread the tomatoes in a roasting pan and place in the oven. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 30 minutes, or until the tomatoes are shrivelled. Break the ends from the asparagus at their natural breaking point. Add the tender lengths of asparagus to the tomatoes and continue to cook for 25 minutes or until the asparagus is tender. ; name: asparagus with beer and honey sauce ; ingredients: fresh asparagus, thyme leaves, dark beer, dijon mustard, garlic clove, honey, pepper, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. In a shallow dish, toss the asparagus, olive oil and salt and pepper together. Lay the asparagus in one level layer. Place in oven and roast, uncovered for approximately 10 minutes, or until the asparagus is just tender. Transfer to a serving plate. Whisk the lemon juice, lemon zest, dill, olive oil and honey together in a small bowl. Top the asparagus with some of the dressing and keep the rest on the side. ; name: baked asparagus ; ingredients: fresh asparagus, seasoned bread crumbs, salt and pepper, garlic powder, parmesan cheese, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Line a 10 x 15 inch rimmed baking sheet with foil. Place vegetables in pan and sprinkle with olive oil and toss until covered evenly. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic powder. Cover broiler pan or cookie sheet with foil and spread asparagus in one layer. Spray with cooking spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook for 12 minutes or less. Heat butter in a small skillet on low heat until lightly brown. Add vinegar and soy sauce. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: irish creamy fudge ; ingredients: evaporated milk, light brown sugar, white sugar, unsalted butter, salt, vanilla extract, irish cream, icing sugar ; preparation:Grease an 8-inch square pan and line with parchment paper so that it hangs over the sides. Remove from heat, stir in vanilla and irish cream and scrape into a bowl or mixer fitted with the paddle attachment. With the mixer on low speed or electric beaters, add in the icing sugar in three additions, mixing well after each addition. Scrape fudge into prepared pan and let cool completely before slicing. ; name: candy cane fudge ; ingredients: vanilla baking chips, sweetened condensed milk, peppermint extract, candy canes, red food coloring ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, sweetened condensed milk, peppermint extract, candy canes, red food coloring. name: baked pork chops with apples ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, apples, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, butter, salt, pepper, cranberry juice ; preparation:Sear pork chops, 2 minutes per side. Reserve. Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Arrange apple slices in the bottom of a prepared 9x12 baking dish. Sprinkle with brown sugar and cinnamon. Dot with butter. Top apples with seared pork chops. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Pour cranberry juice over all and cover. Bake for 1 hour. Make sure pork reaches an internal temperature of 160 degrees f. ; name: apple braised pork chops ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, onion, garlic clove, olive oil, flour, salt, pepper, apple juice, dried tart cherry ; preparation:In a heavy skillet, saute onion and garlic in olive oil until just about ready to carmelize. Remove vegetables from skillet and set aside. Season chops with salt and pepper. Dredge with flour on both sides. Brown chops for about five minutes on each side. After browning both sides, pour apple juice over chops. Let the chops cook in the juice for another five minutes over med-low heat. Do not cover. Remove chops and add onion and garlic back into the pan. Reduce sauce slightly, adding dried cherries in last 2-3 minutes of cooking. To serve, plate chops with wild rice and spoon a bit of the sauce over each chop. Depending on thickness of the chops, you may need to adjust cooking time slightly. ; name: grilled pork chops with vanilla scented apples ; ingredients: pork chops, sweet apples, butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, apple juice, licor 43, pure vanilla extract, salt and pepper ; preparation:Grill pork chops until barely done. Cook apples just until done, then remove with a slotted spoon and set apples aside. Reduce the pan juices to two to three tablespoons. Remove from heat and add vanilla, salt and pepper. Add apple slices and return to heat until the apples are hot. Pour over the pork chops. Serve with rice or potatoes. ; name: autumn apple chops ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, gluten-free flour, butter, onion, apple juice ; preparation:Place chops in a shallow dish. Bake 12 to 15 minutes. Cool on a wire rack. ; name: brown sugar oatmeal muffins ; ingredients: oatmeal, whole wheat flour, flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, dark brown sugar, milk, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin cups or use paper liners. Mix oats, flours, baking powder and salt in a large bowl. Whisk eggs and brown sugar in another bowl. When smooth, whisk in milk, melted butter and vanilla. Pour over dry ingredients and fold in just until dry ingredients are moistened. Scoop into mufifn cups. Bake 15 to 25 minutes or until springy to the touch in the center. ; name: marshmallow muffins ; ingredients: marshmallows, all-purpose flour, unsweetened cocoa, baking powder, salt, light brown sugar, eggs, milk, sunflower oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease a 12-cup muffin pan or line with 12 muffin paper liners. Using scissors, cut the marshmallows in half. Sift together the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt into a large bowl. Stir in the sugar and marshmallows. Lightly beat the eggs in a large bowl, then beat in the milk and oil. Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients and pour in the beaten liquid ingredients. Stir gently until just combined. Do not overmix. Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin pan. Bake in the preheated oven for about 25 minutes, until well risen and firm to the touch. name: season s easy jam bars ; ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla, egg, flour, baking powder, jam ; preparation:Heat oven 180c. Grease 2 pans 19cm x 29cm. Line trays with baking paper. Combine butter, sugar, eggs and essence in large bowl. Add sifted flour and oats and mix well. Divide mixture into 3 equal portions. Press 1 portion over base of one tray. Repeat with 2nd portion over base of 2nd tray. Heat jam and spread over the 2 bases. Crumble remaining mix over jam in both trays. Bake 30 minutes or till browned, cool in pans. ; name: raspberry squares ; ingredients: baking powder, flour, butter, egg, milk, sugar, coconut, margarine, vanilla, raspberry jam ; preparation:Mix all ingredients for the base and put into greased 8x8 pan. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: coconut pecan snack cake ; ingredients: betty crocker yellow cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, coconut pecan frosting ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degree celsius. Lightly grease and line a 20cm cake tin and line with baking paper. In a bowl combine the flour, oats, bicarbonate of soda, allspice, sugar and pecans. Make a well in the centre and then add the oil and egg and then the apples and combine all ingredients well together. Pour mix into the prepared tin and cook for 35 minutes until golden brown. ; name: tropical coconut cake ; ingredients: cream of coconut, sweetened condensed milk, crushed pineapple, yellow cake mix, eggs, oil, water, whipped topping, shredded coconut ; preparation:Bake the cake as directed. Mix the cream of coconut and sweetened condensed milk together. As soon as cake is done, punch a lot of holes in cake. Slowly pour the cream of coconut mixture into holes and all over cake. Pour pineapple, juice and all, over cake. Refrigerate until cold. Mix whipped topping and shredded coconut together and spread over the cake. Keep refrigerated. It must be cold to taste good. name: asparagus almondine ; ingredients: almonds, cornstarch, chicken broth, fresh asparagus, lemon peel, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375-400f. Remove fibrous end pieces of asparagus. Lay asparagus across shallow baking dish and add oil, salt, lemon juice, and pepper. Roll and toss to coat well. Arrange the oiled asparagus in the pan so they do not overlap. Bake in oven 20 minutes. ; name: roasted asparagus with browned butter ; ingredients: asparagus spear, olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, butter, lemon juice, garlic, lemon zest ; preparation:Preheat over 450 degrees. Place asparagus in a roasting pan. Drizzle iwth olive oil. Sprinkle evenly with salt and pepper. Bake for 8 minutes or until tender-crisp. In the meantime, melt butter and minced garlic in a small skillet over medium-high heat. Cook 3 minutes or until lightly browned and foamy, shaking pan occasionally. Do not burn. Remove from heat. Stir in lemon juice. Drizzle butter mixture over roasted asparagus, toss well to coat. Srinkle lemon zest over asparagus. ; name: grilled asparagus with garlic and fresh lemon ; ingredients: asparagus, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, lemon ; preparation:Toss asparagus in extra virgin olive oil and minced garlic. Place asparagus on hot grill. Liberally season asparagus with salt and pepper. Grill asparagus until lightly charred and tender-crisp. Remove from grill and squeeze lemon juice onto asparagus. ; name: asian spring asparagus ; ingredients: asparagus, vegetable oil, ginger, black pepper, soy sauce, natural almonds ; preparation:Trim woody ends of asparagus spears. Add soy sauce and stir-fry 2 minutes longer. Add almonds and stir-fry briefly just to heat through. ; name: baked asparagus ; ingredients: fresh asparagus, seasoned bread crumbs, salt and pepper, garlic powder, parmesan cheese, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Line a 10 x 15 inch rimmed baking sheet with foil. Place vegetables in pan and sprinkle with olive oil and toss until covered evenly. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic powder. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: mom s rice pudding ; ingredients: milk, sugar, rice, eggs, cinnamon, golden raisin, vanilla ; preparation:Combine sugar and milk in a saucepan. Place over medium heat. Stir until sugar is dissolved, then heat to just below the simmer point. Add rice and cook until the rice is soft, 20-30 minutes. Beat egg yolks in a small bowl. Add hot milk, a spoonful at a time, beating well after each addition, until the egg yolks have tripled in volume and are very warm. Add the egg yolks to the pan and stir well. Add raisins, cinnamon and vanilla, and stir well. Beat egg whites to soft peaks. Fold egg whites and custard together and transfer to a baking dish. Stir in liqueur, vanilla and butter, stirring until butter melts. ; name: my favorite rice pudding ; ingredients: eggs, milk, sugar, butter, vanilla, salt, cooked rice, raisins, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Beat eggs. name: spicy hummus ; ingredients: lemon, juice of, olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, black pepper, dried ancho pepper, hot sauce, cumin, sesame seeds, chickpeas ; preparation:Drain 1 can of chick peas and use the other with the liquid. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: rosemary grilled chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, lime peel, lime juice, fresh rosemary, olive oil, sugar, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Place each chicken breast between two pieces of wax paper and pound to an even thickness. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: southern living mexican casserole ; ingredients: ground chuck, onions, cream of chicken soup, tomatoes and green chilies, ranch style beans, corn tortillas, processed cheese ; preparation:Cook gound chuck and diced onion in a dutch oven, stirring until meat crumbles and is no longer pink. name: banana cherry cake ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, bananas, eggs, vanilla extract, milk, oil, cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Beat flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, bananas, eggs, vanilla extract, milk, oil, cherries. Beat with electric mixer at medium speed for 10 minutes. Add cherries, mix to incorporate. Pour into ungreased bundt pan. Bake for 50 minutes. Do not remove from pan until cooled. Sprinkle for powdered sugar for garnish. ; name: moist cherrie cake ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, sunflower oil, milk, flour, baking powder, salt, vanilla extract, cherries, ground nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f, & lightly coat baking sheet with cooking spray. In large bowl, beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: cherry chocolate chip cake ; ingredients: white cake mix, sour cream, vegetable oil, almond extract, egg whites, maraschino cherries, miniature semisweet chocolate chips, frosting ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Grease bottom only of 13x9x2 pan with shortening. Do not flour. Beat cake mix, sour cream, oil, almond extract and egg whites in large bowl with electric mixer on low speed for 30 seconds. Beat on medium speed 2 minutes. Stir in chopped cherries and chocolate chips. Pour into pan. Bake 35 to 45 minutes or until cake springs back when touched lightly in center. Cool completely, about 1 hour. Spread frosting over top of cake. Store loosely covered at room temperature. ; name: double cherry dessert ; ingredients: cherry chip cake mix, eggs, butter, chocolate chips, cherry pie filling, walnuts, powdered sugar, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. name: barbecue burgers ; ingredients: lean ground beef, barbecue sauce, barbecue potato chips, onion powder, salt, black pepper, cheese slices ; preparation:In small frying pan, heat 1 tablespoon of the oil. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: brown sugar rubbed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, brown sugar, paprika, onion powder, salt, chili powder ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium-high. Combine sugar and spices in a resealable plastic bag. Wash hands. Add chicken to bag, one piece at a time, shaking to coat. Transfer to plate. Spray on both sides with nonstick cooking spray. Serve with baked potatoes, sour cream and chives, and steamed broccoli. ; name: chicken bites with spice ; ingredients: ground chicken, fresh breadcrumbs, green onions, coriander, garlic, ginger, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c. Place minced chicken, breadcrumbs, green onions, coriander, garlic, ginger and egg in a food processor and pulse to combine. Bake chicken bites for 25 minutes or until lightly browned. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillet, lemon, fresh dill, mayonnaise, salt, white pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. name: new york steaks with red wine marinade ; ingredients: new york strip steaks, dry red wine, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, bay leaves, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Sear steaks in hot oil, until cooked to your preference. Remove steaks, cover and keep warm. In same pan saute onions for 2 minutes, add wine and cook over high heat until reduced by half. Add half and half cream. Boil until reduced by half. Stir in boursin cheese or garlic cream cheese until thick and hot. Pour sauce over hot steaks, garnish with parsley. ; name: simple teriyaki steak dinner ; ingredients: butter, bell pepper, fresh mushrooms, boneless strip steaks, garlic salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, teriyaki baste and glaze, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Bake teriyaki steak in oven for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and allow to cool. ; name: grilled steak ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, crystallized ginger, teriyaki sauce, garlic, onions, brown sugar, black pepper, steak, port wine ; preparation:Place all ingredients except for steak in storage bag and give a shake to mix marinade. Add steak and marinade 6-8 hours or even overnight. Remove steak from marinade. Bring steak to room temperature. Place marinade in a small saucepan add 2 tablespoons port and simmer 5-10 minutes. Grill steak on a medium high heat for 4-6 minutes each side. Let steak sit for 10 minutes before slicing and serve along with the hot sauce. ; name: flank steak with teriyaki marinade ; ingredients: flank steaks, garlic, fresh lemon juice, soy sauce, honey, olive oil ; preparation:Make inch slits in one side of the steak with a sharp paring knife. Fill slits with garlic and put steak in a shallow dish large enough to hold it. Whisk together remaining ingredients until emulsified. Pour over steak, turning steak to coat well, let marinate, covered, turning occasionally, for 1 hour at room temperature and up to 10 hours, chilled. Let steak come to room temperature and discard garlic. Broil 4 inches from heat, turning once, 10-12 minutes for medium-rare meat and reserve pan juices. Alternatively, remove steak from marinade and grill over hot coals, brushing occasionally with marinade for the same amount of time as the broiler. Transfer to a platter and let stand 10 minutes. Slice thin across the grain and serve with reserved pan juices. ; name: steak paste ; ingredients: steak, anchovies, butter, salt, pepper, cayenne ; preparation:Remove any fat from the steak. name: parmesan chicken and potatoes ; ingredients: chicken breasts, italian dressing, potatoes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. name: baked eggplant melt sandwich ; ingredients: unseasoned breadcrumbs, fresh basil, parmesan cheese, salt, egg, eggplants, olive oil, buns, pasta sauce, part-skim mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees f. Combine breadcrumbs, basil, parmesan and salt in shallow bowl. Whisk egg in another shallow bowl and dip eggplant slices, then coat each slice in the breadcrumb mixture. Set toasted buns halves, cut side down, on baking sheet. Divide eggplant slices evenly among bun halves, spoon on sauce and top with cheese. Brush eggplant slices with oil, grill eggplant slices and sweet pepper quarters on the rack of an uncovered grill directly over medium hot coals for 4 minutes, or broil. Turn and grill 3 to 5 minutes more or till eggplant slices are tender and sweet peppers are slightly charred. Remove veggies from grill, set aside. Spread one side of each french bread slice with goat cheese and mustard. Layer three eggplant slices and two sweet pepper quarters on each of four bread slices. Top with remaining bread slices. Serve warm. ; name: grilled eggplant arugula and mozzarella panini ; ingredients: eggplants, extra virgin olive oil, salt, bread, arugula leaves, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Brush eggplant slices with oil on both sides and place in a george foreman grill--or panini grill-- cook 4 minutes, remove. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: roasted potatoes peppers and onions with rosemary ; ingredients: baking potatoes, sweet red pepper, sweet green pepper, onions, garlic, olive oil, fresh rosemary, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Arrange the potatoes and the red and green peppers alternately in a spoke pattern in a shallow, 12-inch round baking dish. Pile the onions in the center. Scatter the garlic over the top. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with rosemary, salt and black pepper. Bake in the preheated oven until the vegetables are lightly golden and tender, or about 45 minutes. Garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs. ; name: oven fried rosemary potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, garlic, fresh rosemary leaf, salt & freshly ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Cut each potato in 6-8 wedges, depending on size. Place in a plastic bag, add garlic and spices, and shake to coat. Drizzle with olive oil, and shake again. Lightly oil a baking sheet, and transfer potatoes to sheet. Drizzle oil and herbs remaining in bag over potatoes, keeping as much as possible on the potatoes. Place in a preheated 400degf oven, turning as necessary, and bake until soft on the inside and browned and crisp on the outside. If fixing with breaded lamb chops, place in oven while it preheats and all of the time while the lamb chops bake. ; name: rosemary roasted chicken with potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, paprika, rosemary, garlic, black pepper, salt, chicken breast halves, small red potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. name: roasted brussels sprouts with almonds and honey ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, unsalted butter, slivered almonds, salt & freshly ground black pepper, honey, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place sprouts, butter, and almonds on a rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper. Toss to combine. Roast, stirring, until golden brown and tender, 35 to 40 minutes. Transfer to a serving bowl. Immediately dress with honey and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: sauteed brussels sprouts with ginger and parmesan ; ingredients: brussels sprout, olive oil, butter, dry white wine, gingerroot, garlic, vegetable broth, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Place brussels sprouts in shallow baking dish. In a small bowl, combine oil, vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper, garlic, vegetable broth, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese. Pour evenly over sprouts then sprinkle with the cheese. Bake at 350 for about 20 minutes, or until brussels sprouts are tender. ; name: sesame ginger brussels sprouts ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, soy sauce, fresh ginger, sesame oil, olive oil, onion, water ; preparation:Trim stems and any yellow leaves from brussels sprouts. Cut each sprout lengthwise into quarters. In a cup, stir together soy sauce, grated ginger and sesame oil. Meanwhile, in nonstick 12-inch skillet heat olive oil over medium heat until hot. Add onion and cook about 5 minutes or until it begins to soften, stirring occasionally. Increase heat to medium high, add brussels sprouts and water. Cover and cook about 5 minutes or until sprouts are beginning to soften and brown, stirring once. Remove cover from skillet and cook about 5 minutes longer or until sprouts are tender-crisp, stirring frequently. Remove skillet from heat. Stir in soy sauce mixture. ; name: brussels sprouts with garlic and lemon ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, brussels sprout, lemon pepper, sea salt, lemon zest ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot. ; name: pan fried brussels sprouts with sriracha honey and lime ; ingredients: brussels sprout, sriracha sauce, honey, lime juice, salt, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. name: sunday pot roast ; ingredients: chuck roast, dry onion soup mix, condensed cream of mushroom soup, condensed cream of celery soup, worcestershire sauce, potato, carrot, mushrooms ; preparation:For slow cooker cooking put the vegetables on the bottom to infuse the flavors of the meat into the vegetables. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: another green bean casserole ; ingredients: green beans, onion, cream of mushroom soup, velveeta cheese, french-fried onions, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place the green beans and onion in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil then lower temperature and simmer until about half of the liquid has evaporated. To the saucepan with the beans and liquid add the mushroom soup, cheese, salt and pepper. Continue to simmer on low until the cheese melts. After the cheese melts taste to see if it needs more cheese if so add now, if not pour the mixture into a greased baking dish and cover and bake on 350 for 30 minutes or until bubbly. Uncover and sprinkle french fried onions on top and place back in oven and bake until browned. Let stand about 3 minutes before serving. ; name: special green bean casserole ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, sugar, pepper, onion, sour cream, french style green beans, swiss cheese, corn flakes ; preparation:Saute onion in butter. name: mushroom steak topper ; ingredients: butter, onion, mushrooms, garlic, garlic powder, salt, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degree season meat with seasonings. In large skillet over medium high heat, saute the meat until well browned on all sides. Next, place the potatoes, onions, green peppers and mushrooms over the meat. Top with salad dressing, and cover with foil. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour, or until potatoes are done and meat is tender. ; name: mushroom and wine steak sauce ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, butter, onion, garlic, condensed beef broth, tomato paste, ground pepper, cornstarch, water, dry red wine ; preparation:Melt butter in a saucepan. Add mushrooms, onion and garlic. Saute until golden, about 5 minutes. Stir in broth, tomato paste and black pepper. Bring to the boiling point. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. Blend cornstarch with water. Mix some of the hot mushroom sauce into cornstarch mixture and return to saucepan. Cook and stir until clear and thickened. Stir in wine and cook until hot. Serve over steak, hamburgers or other meat. ; name: sauteed steak house style mushrooms ; ingredients: olive oil, unsalted butter, mixed herbs, thyme, garlic cloves, dried onion flakes, wine, sliced mushrooms, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Melt butter in a saucepan. Add mushrooms, onion and garlic. Saute until golden, about 5 minutes. Stir in broth, tomato paste and black pepper. Bring to the boiling point. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. Blend cornstarch with water. Mix some of the hot mushroom sauce into cornstarch mixture and return to saucepan. Cook and stir until golden brown and butter has been absorbed. Add lemon mixture to mushrooms, stirring until sauce is absorbed. ; name: sauteed sirloin and mushrooms ; ingredients: boneless beef sirloin, herb seasoning mix, butter, beef broth, hoisin sauce, onion, fresh mushrooms ; preparation:Cut steak into 4 servings-size pieces. Sprinkle with herb pepper or garlic pepper. In a 10-inch skillet cook steaks in hot butter over medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes or to desired doneness, turning once. Remove steak from pan. Cover and keep warm. For mushroom glaze, carefully add beef broth and hoisin, teriyaki, or worcestershire sauce to skillet. Cook until bubbly, scraping brown bits from bottom skillet. Stir in onoin wedges and sliced mushrooms. Cook over medium-high about 8 minutes or until vegetables are tender and the glaze is reduced to half its volume. Transfer warm steak to dinner plates and spoon glaze on steaks. ; name: beef mushroom dijon ; ingredients: boneless beef top sirloin steak, vegetable oil cooking spray, sliced mushrooms, onion, cream of mushroom soup, water, dijon-style mustard, cooked rice, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degree season meat with seasonings. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: black forest potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, cider vinegar, vegetable oil, water, pepper, sauerkraut, green onion, parsley, salt, tart apple ; preparation:In 2-quart saucepan over medium heat, cook potatoes, covered, in 2 inches boiling water until tender, about 12 minutes. In the meantime mix the rest of the ingredients together in a bowl. Peel potatoes and chop into bite size pieces. Add chopped potatoes to mixture in bowl and carefully combine until everything is mixed up. Slice or cut in rounds as thin as possible cukes & onions. Place in bowl and cover with vinegar. Add 3-5 heaping tablespoons of sugar, mix well. Chill and serve. name: cherry cupcakes ; ingredients: chocolate cake mix, eggs, water, vegetable oil, cherry pie filling, vanilla frosting ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare cake mix according to package directions, using the eggs, water, and oil. Spoon batter into 24 paper-lined muffin pan cups, filling two-thirds full. Remove 24 cherries from cherry pie filling and set aside. Spoon generous teaspoon of remaining cherry filling onto center of each cupcake. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for 20-25 minutes. Cool in pans on wire racks for 10 minutes, then remove from pan and let cool completely. Frost cupcakes with vanilla frosting, and garnish each one with a reserved cherry. ; name: pancakes with fresh strawberries ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, milk, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, egg, strawberry, whipped cream ; preparation:Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt in a medium bowl. Put a little oil on a griddle or large skillet and heat over medium-high heat. Drop the batter by tablespoons onto the griddle or in the pan to form several small pancakes. Cook until golden on each side. Transfer the pancakes to plates. Top the pancakes with a few strawberries and some whipped cream. ; name: double cherry dessert ; ingredients: cherry chip cake mix, eggs, butter, chocolate chips, cherry pie filling, walnuts, powdered sugar, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. While the pasta is cooking, combine the olive oil, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, and basil. Mix well. Once the pasta is cooked, drain and separate between two plates. name: thai lemongrass chicken ; ingredients: garlic cloves, black peppercorns, kosher salt, cilantro, lemongrass, lime, skinless chicken thighs, fresh cilantro stem ; preparation:In a mortar or spice mill, grind garlic, peppercorns, cilantro roots and salt and set aside in a large dish or resealable plastic bag. Using spice mill or food processor, pulse lemongrass a few times until it is finely shredded and add to ground spices. Mix in lime juice, mixing well. Add chicken to mixture and work mixture into flesh, using your hands, and allow to marinate for 6 hours or overnight. Preheat oven to 400f. Roast chicken in a pan with a drainage rack for 40-45 minutes or until juices run clear. Serve garnished with fresh cilantro sprigs, if desired. Pass thai red chile sauce at the table, and serve with steamed jasmine rice. ; name: honey lime chicken skewers ; ingredients: soy sauce, honey, olive oil, lime, garlic cloves, chili-garlic sauce, red pepper flakes, fresh cilantro, boneless chicken breast, salt ; preparation:In a large glass bowl whisk together oil, honey, soy sauce, barbecue sauce and black pepper until well combined. Add in garlic pieces and green onion. Add in the chicken strips and toss with the marinade to combine well. Cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 8-24 hours. Remove the chicken strips and discard the marinade. Thread chicken on the wooden skewers piercing at least 3 times through the skewers. Grill over medium heat. ; name: chicken chorizo skewers ; ingredients: chicken thigh fillets, olive oil, garlic cloves, ground oregano, sweet paprika, lemon juice, brown sugar, chorizo sausages ; preparation:Combine chicken, oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, lemon juice and sugar in a bowl. Place in the fridge for 2 hours to marinate. Evenly thread the chicken, alternating with chorizo, among the skewers. Heat a char-grill pan or barbecue on high. Add the skewers and cook, turning, for 6-8 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. ; name: lemongrass steamed chicken ; ingredients: chicken thighs, salt and pepper, corn oil, lemongrass, soy sauce, lime wedge, cilantro ; preparation:Sprinkle the chicken with salt and pepper. Put oil in a deep skillet over medium high heat. Spread the lemongrass in the skillet. Cover. When lemongrass begins to fry and is fragrant, place the chicken, skin side down over the lemongrass. Turn the heat to medium, cover. Cook, turning and basting with the soy sauce every 10 minutes or so until the chicken is cooked through, about 30 minutes. Discard the lemongrass and serve the chicken with lime wedges and cilantro. ; name: chicken on lemongrass skewers ; ingredients: lemongrass, peanut oil, lime rind, coriander leaves, chicken breasts, lime juice, birds eye chiles, macadamia nut oil, raw sugar, garlic clove ; preparation:In a large glass bowl whisk together oil, honey, soy sauce, barbecue sauce and black pepper until well combined. Add in garlic pieces and green onion. Add in the chicken strips and toss with the marinade to combine well. Cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 8-24 hours. Remove the chicken strips and discard the marinade. Thread chicken on the wooden skewers piercing at least 3 times through the skewers. Grill over medium heat. ; name: chicken chorizo skewers ; ingredients: chicken thigh fillets, olive oil, garlic cloves, ground oregano, sweet paprika, lemon juice, brown sugar, chorizo sausages ; preparation:Combine chicken, oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, lemon juice and sugar in a bowl. Place in the fridge for 2 hours to marinate. Evenly thread the chicken, alternating with chorizo, among the skewers. Heat a char-grill pan or barbecue on high. Add the skewers and cook, turning, for 6-8 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. ; name: lemongrass steamed chicken ; ingredients: chicken thighs, salt and pepper, corn oil, lemongrass, soy sauce, lime wedge, cilantro ; preparation:Sprinkle the chicken with salt and pepper. name: fluffy white bread bread machine ; ingredients: warm water, active dry yeast, flour, vital wheat gluten flour, sugar, butter, salt ; preparation:Proof yeast in water. For bread machine - place all ingredients in order directed by your bread machine and process. By hand - combine all and knead until elastic, about 10 minutes. Place in a greased bowl, cover and let rise for an hour. Punch down. Place in a greased loaf pan, cover and let rise another 20 minutes. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or so. ; name: throw away the bread machine instructions white bread ; ingredients: warm water, white sugar, bread machine yeast, butter, oil, white bread flour, salt ; preparation:Add all ingredients except flour to your white bread machine in the order listed. Use dough cycle only. Remove dough from white bread machine and shape into loaf. Sprinkle with flour. Let rise until double, about 1 hour. Bake at 450 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the top is golden brown. ; name: sour cream bread bread machine ; ingredients: water, sour cream, bread flour, light brown sugar, gluten, salt, fast rising yeast ; preparation:Add all ingredients to the pan according to the order in the manufacturers directions, with the water and the sour cream put in first, and adding the dry ingredients in on top. Set crust on medium and program for the basic cycle. Press start. When the baking cycle ends, immediately remove the bread from the pan and place it on a rack. Let cool to room temperature before slicing. ; name: basic white bread ; ingredients: active dry yeast, salt, sugar, vegetable oil, flour, milk ; preparation:Dissolve yeast in water, in a large bowl. Add half the flour, and the sugar, salt, and shortening. Blend at low speed, then beat 2 minutes at med speed. Mix in remaining flour by hand. Cover and let rise until doubled, about 45 minutes. Stir the batter hard for 30 seconds. Spread into 2 8in greased loaf pans. Let rise until doubled, about 20 minutes. Bake at 325 for about 45 minutes, until golden brown and done. ; name: italian bread bread machine ; ingredients: water, olive oil, sugar, dry yeast, all-purpose flour, salt, egg white, cornmeal ; preparation:Add into bread machine container, warmed water, olive oil, sugar, yeast. Let yeast foam a bit. Dump in flour. Add salt on top of flour. Turn on bread machine to dough setting. Watch for the first bit and add flour as needed to get a good dough. Get cookie sheet ready by lightly oiling with olive oil and sprinkle on cornmeal. Form dough into loaf and set on cookie sheet with tea towel to cover until doubled in size. Preheat oven to 375f. Cut slits diagonally in loaf with sharp knife. Brush with egg white. Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown and when you knock the bottom of bread it sounds hollow. ; name: best bread machine bread ; ingredients: warm water, white sugar, bread machine yeast, oil, skim milk powder, white bread flour, salt ; preparation:Add all ingredients except flour to your bread machine in the order listed. Mix all ingredients, excluding lollipops, to form dough. Roll out the dough on a lightly floured work surface. With a scalloped-edged cookie cutter, cut large circles from dough. Place the scalloped circles onto lined cookie sheets. With a small cookie cutter, cut out desired shape from the centers of each circle. Remove the dough and fill the shape with crushed lollipops. Bake for 10 minutes, or until the candy melts in the cookie centers. Allow to cool before removing from tray. ; name: soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, margarine, vanilla, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. In large bowl, beat sugar, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and eggs. Blend well. Add flour, baking soda and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown. ; name: light chocolate chip oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: margarine, dark brown sugar, egg, vanilla, cinnamon, whole wheat flour, baking powder, oats, dark chocolate chips ; preparation:Combine margarine, sugar, egg, vanilla and cinnamon. name: beer and beef crock pot ; ingredients: beer, boneless beef chuck roast, plain flour, butter, onions, garlic cloves, tomato paste, cayenne, bay leaves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place beef in crock pot, cover and cook on low for 7-8 hours. Remove beef from crock pot, cover and cook on low for 7-8 hours. Remove beef from crock pot, cover and cook on ; name: crock pot burgundy beef ; ingredients: stewing beef, burgundy wine, garlic cloves, onion, cream of mushroom soup, salt, fresh ground black pepper, flour, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Dust beef with flour. Brown meat, onions and garlic in olive oil. Remove from pan. Add wine and soup, stirring to mix. Season with salt and pepper. Place meat mixture in crock pot and top with wine and soup. Cook on low for 6-8 hours. Serve over white, brown, or wild rice. ; name: crock pot beef roast ; ingredients: top round roast, tomato sauce, white wine, prepared horseradish, sugar, pepper, parsley, oregano, fresh thyme leave, bay leaves ; preparation:Place beef on top of vegetables. Mix horseradish, salt, pepper and 1 cup water. Pour over top of beef. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours or until beef and vegetables are tender. Remove 2 cups of juices from crock pot and put into small sauce pan. Mix corn starch with 2 t cold water and then add to juices. Bring to a boil while stirring constantly until thickened. Serve gravy over meat and vegetables. ; name: baltimore crock pot beef stew ; ingredients: stew meat, dry onion soup mix, mushroom gravy, potatoes, baby carrots, peas, mushrooms, dry white wine, black pepper, flour ; preparation:In 4-quart crock pot, place frozen meatballs and frozen vegetables. In a bowl, stir together tomatoes, gravy, water and seasonings. Pour over meatballs & vegetables. Cover and cook on low-heat for 6-8 hours or high-heat for 4 hours. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: swedish nuts ; ingredients: egg whites, granulated sugar, salt, vanilla extract, pecan halves, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Melt butter in a 9x13 baking pan by placing pan in the oven. Evenly spread coated nuts over melted butter in pan. Bake for 30 minutes, stirring and turning nuts about every 8 minutes, or until butter no longer remains in pan. Place hot nuts on foil and allow to cool. May be stored in an airtight container for several weeks. ; name: kavring small sugar rusks ; ingredients: butter, sugar, milk, egg, baking powder, flour, cardamom seeds, salt ; preparation:Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat. name: chili citrus chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, chili powder, ground cumin, garlic salt, cayenne pepper, vegetable oil, fresh lemon juice, fresh lime juice, jalapeno jelly ; preparation:In small dish, mix the chili powder, cumin, garlic salt, and the cayenne pepper. Rub the mixture on each chicken breast half. In frypan, place the oil and heat to medium temperature. Cook the chicken in pan, turning. Cook the chicken until juices are clear when pierced with a fork. Remove the chicken and keep warm. Combine the juices and jelly in the frying pan. Bring to a boil and cook for 2 min or so. Spoon sauce over the chicken. ; name: spicy honey glazed chicken breasts ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic clove, honey, hot pepper sauce, chili powder, lemon juice, boneless skinless chicken breasts, pineapple ; preparation:In a small saucepan, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook, stirring, until translucent and beginning to brown, 6 to 8 minutes. Add the honey, hot pepper sauce and chili powder and simmer for 1 minute. Remove from the heat, stir in the lemon juice and set aside. Preheat a grill or large grill pan to medium-high. Rub the chicken with the remaining 3 tablespoons olive oil and season with salt. Grill until well marked, about 7 minutes. Flip and cook until the bottoms are well marked and the chicken is cooked through, another 2 minutes. Transfer to a plate and brush with the reserved honey glaze. Cover with foil and let rest for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, grill the pineapple until well marked on one side, about 4 minutes, then flip and cook for another 2 minutes. Serve with the chicken. ; name: creole mustard orange chicken ; ingredients: green onions, skinless chicken pieces, orange juice, low sodium chicken broth, spicy brown mustard, honey, bottled hot pepper sauce, white rice ; preparation:Place chicken pieces, bone side up on unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil 4-5 inches from the heat, about 20 minutes or until light brown. Meanwhile in a bowl stir together oil, mustard, lemon juice, lemon pepper seasoning, oregano and red pepper. Brush mustard mixture onto chicken. Turn chicken, brush with remaning mixture. Broil for 5-15 minutes more or until chicken is no longer pink. ; name: indonesian chilli chicken ; ingredients: chicken breasts, garlic, dry crushed red pepper, ginger, onions, oil, coconut milk ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large saute pan. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: beet greens with bacon and balsamic vinegar ; ingredients: beet leaf, beets, bacon, olive oil, onion, water, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium high heat, cook bacon in olive oil until starting to lightly brown, about 5-7 minutes. Add chopped onion and continue to cook until onion is translucent and starts to brown lightly, another 3- 4 minutes. Add beet greens and roasted beets, water and a pinch of salt and pepper. Cover and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally, until greens start to wilt. Add balsamic vinegar and continue to cook until greens have wilted, about another 3-4 minutes and liquid has evaporated slightly. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer to serving bowl and offer additional balsamic at the table, if desired. ; name: beets leeks and onions ; ingredients: beet, onions, baby leeks, garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh rosemary, bay leaves, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Heat the oven to 425 degrees f. Add the herbs, sprinkle over the vinegar and season well. Put the pan in the oven and roast for about 15 minutes, then reduce the heat to 375 degrees f and continue cooking for another 30 minutes or so, stirring 2 or 3 times until the beets are tender. If the vegetables start to burn, add a little more oil and vinegar to the pan. ; name: honey lemon beets ; ingredients: beets, butter, onion, honey, lemon juice, nutmeg, salt and pepper ; preparation:Scrub beets but do not peel. name: blueberry jam half recipe ; ingredients: blueberries, lemon juice, water, dry low-sugar pectin, sugar ; preparation:Place blueberries, lemon juice, water, dry low-sugar pectin, sugar in a large bowl. Add to a large bowl and add cinnamon and pectin. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly for 3-5 minutes. Add sugar and bring to jam stage stirring constantly to prevent scorching. Boil for 3 minutes more. Skim off any foam with a wooden spoon. Jar as usual. ; name: my blueberry jam ; ingredients: blueberries, sugar, lemon juice, liquid pectin ; preparation:In food processor slightly chop the 6 cups of blueberries. Ladle the hot berry mixture into jars. Wipe tops and place lids on jars and screw caps into place. Place in water bath canner with 1 inch of water covering jars. Bring to a full boil and cover for 10 minutes. Remove jars from water bath after 10 minutes and place on counter to cool. Listen for tops of jars to pop and seal. Cool completely. Jam should be good in jars for up to 1 year. ; name: cherry bounce jam bread machine ; ingredients: dark sweet cherries, sugar, cherry brandy, fresh lemon juice, dry pectin, ground allspice ; preparation:Mix together the dry ingredients. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: creole celery cabbage ; ingredients: chinese cabbage, butter, onion, green bell pepper, tomatoes, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f and lightly grease a casserole dish. Cover chinese cabbage with boiling water and cook for about ten minutes or until tender. Drain very well. Melt butter. Add onions and peppers and cook slowly for about five minutes. Add tomatoes and heat to the boiling point. Add cabbage, salt and pepper. Pour into a baking dish, cover and bake in oven for 30 to 40 minutes. ; name: oriental cabbage ; ingredients: onion, water, garlic clove, fresh ginger, sesame oil, cabbage, soy sauce ; preparation:Slice onion. Place in bowl with water. Cover and microwave on high for 3 minutes. Put onion in large skillet with remaining ingredients. Cook, covered, over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until cabbage is tender, about 20 minutes. ; name: cabbage skillet hasty tasty ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, bell pepper, garlic powder, cabbage, brown rice, rotel tomatoes, broth, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook the beef, seasoned salt, garlic powder, carrots and onions until beef is browned and veggies are crisp tender. Drain and return to skillet. Add water, cabbage, green peppers, soy sauce and seasoning packet from the noodles. Break noodles into small pieces, add to pan and stir well to cover noodles with liquid. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and noodles are tender. ; name: bacon and rice creole ; ingredients: bacon, green bell pepper, onions, salt, canned tomatoes, brown rice ; preparation:Simmer vegetables and spices in a saucepan. At the same time, fry the bacon. When bacon is done, remove from pan and crumble into small pieces. Drain off all fat. Let rice brown lightly. Add the vegetables and bacon. Let simmer over very low heat for 30 minutes. Check after 20 minutes to see if it is drying out. If so, add more tomatoes, or some water, or a combination of both. ; name: sauteed cabbage and carrots ; ingredients: cabbage, carrot, garlic cloves, onion, fresh ginger, black pepper, salt, white vinegar, canola oil ; preparation:Place cabbage in a medium saucepan. Add water to cover by one inch. Bring to a boil. Partially cover and boil until tender crisp, about 5-8 minutes. Drain. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium low heat. Add garlic and mushrooms and saute, stirring occasionally, until mushroom liquid evaporates, about 6 minutes. Add carrots, sugar, thyme, salt and pepper, cover and cook over low heat 15 minutes. Uncover, remove garlic. Discard. Increase heat to medium-high. Cook, stirring often, until carrots and mushrooms are very lightly browned, 2-5 minutes. ; name: creole cabbage ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green bell pepper, garlic cloves, butter, tomatoes, rotel tomatoes, tomato sauce, cabbage, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook the beef, seasoned salt, garlic powder, carrots and onions until beef is browned and veggies are crisp tender. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: chipotle lime marinated grilled pork chops or tenderloin ; ingredients: pork chops, chipotle chile in adobo, oregano, garlic cloves, olive oil, lime juice, fresh cilantro, salt ; preparation:For pork, combine all but the salt in a large plastic zipper bag. Marinate in refrigerator, turning the bag occasionally, for 2 hours. Remove pork and discard marinade. Sprinkle pork evenly with salt. Grill pork over indirect heat for about 20 minutes, or until internal temperature reaches 155. Let stand 10 minutes. Slice crosswise. For salsa, combine all ingredients in a large plastic zipper bag ; name: ancho chile and bourbon sauce ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, red onion, bourbon, ancho chilies, chicken stock, apple juice concentrate, whole black peppercorns, light brown sugar ; preparation:Fry the onion and mushrooms in the oil a couple of minutes. Heat 1 tbsp of the oil in a large texas skillet on medium heat and brown the chops on both sides for about 1 minute per side. Remove the chops to a plate. Spoon the pepper and onion mixture over and around the chops. name: deluxe acorn squash ; ingredients: acorn squash, ground pork, apple, brown sugar, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, salt, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Place squash, seeds still in, cut side up on a cookie sheet and bake for 45 minutes or until soft. Remove from oven and scoop out the seeds and fibers. Mix remaining ingredients and distribute evenly into the cavity of each squash. Return to oven for apprx 10 minutes. ; name: baked maple and cinnamon squash ; ingredients: margarine, maple syrup, ground cinnamon, brown sugar, butternut squash ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees, line pan with parchment paper. Place squash on pan cut side up. Combine remaining ingredients and brush half of the mixture on the squash. Bake for 45 minute or until tender. Brush once more halfway through baking, and again near the end. ; name: candied winter squash ; ingredients: butternut squash, brown sugar, maple syrup, butter, orange rind, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, pure vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Peel and cube squash. In a large bowl mix minced garlic and olive oil. Add cubed squash and coat with the oil mixture. Dump all ingredients out of bowl and in to a glass casserole dish. Any size will do really but it will cook faster if it is more spread out. Cook 40-45 minutes, stirring once or twice. Squash is done when it is tender. ; name: delicious squash bread ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, oil, vanilla, all-purpose flour, cinnamon, baking soda, baking powder, summer squash, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease 4 mini loaf pans and dust with flour. Beat eggs in a large bowl. Add sugar, oil, and vanilla to eggs. Sift together flour, cinnamon, baking soda and baking powder and add to egg mixture. Fold in squash and nuts and stir until just mixed. Pour in loaf pans, filling half full. Bake for 25- 30 minutes or an hour and 5 minutes for regular loaf pans. Cooking times vary upon moisture of squash also. Cool before slicing. ; name: roasted acorn squash with bourbon ; ingredients: acorn squash, bourbon, brown sugar, butter, orange juice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the squash cut side up in a baking dish with inch of water in the bottom of the pan. Cover the dish and bake for 45 minutes. Meanwhile, combine the cinnamon, bourbon, brown sugar, butter, orange juice. When squash has been cooked, remove from oven. Let cool down for 10 minutes. Carefully scoop out the pulp from the halves and combine with the pineapple and cinnamon mixture. Replace the squash into the shells and return to the oven and bake for 7 minutes more until pineapple is hot and bubbly. ; name: baked brown sugar squash ; ingredients: acorn squash, butter, brown sugar, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the squash cut side up in a baking dish with inch of water in the bottom of the pan. Cover the dish and bake for 45 minutes. Meanwhile, combine the cinnamon, bourbon, brown sugar, butter, orange juice. When squash has been cooked, remove from oven. Let cool down for 10 minutes. Remove from oven and scoop out the pulp from the halves and combine with the pineapple and cinnamon mixture. Replace the squash into the shells and return to the oven and bake for 7 minutes more until pineapple is hot and bubbly. ; name: baked maple and cinnamon squash ; ingredients: margarine, maple syrup, ground cinnamon, brown sugar, butternut squash ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the squash cut side up in a baking dish with inch of water in the bottom of the pan. Cover the dish and bake for 45 minutes.
