name: coarse black pepper cheese bread ; ingredients: flour, yeast, sugar, salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, milk, shortening, water, egg, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine 2 cups flour, yeast, sugar, salt and pepper. Mix well in a saucepan, heat milk, water and shortening until warm. Add to flour mixture add egg and beat at low speed until moistened. Beat 3 minutes at medium speed. By hand, add cheese and enough flour to make a firm dough. Knead well on a floured surface until smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes. Punch dough down, divide into 2 parts. Shape into 2 round loaves. Place on a greased baking sheet, cover and let rise in a warm oven until light and doubled, about 30 minutes. Bake at 375 degrees for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown. Cool on racks, makes 2 loaves. ; name: damn good cheese bread ; ingredients: french bread, butter, mayonnaise, paprika, parmesan cheese, minced garlic cloves, cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line 2 large baking sheets with silicone baking sheets or parchment paper. In a food processor, chop the parmesan, gruyere and rosemary together until coarsely chopped. Set the cheese mixture aside. Separate the dough strips. Using a pizza cutter or a large sharp knife, cut each dough strip in half lengthwise to form thin strips. Working with dough strip at a time, coat each strip with the olive oil and then the cheese mixture, pressing very gently. Twist each cheese covered dough strip and place onto prepared baking sheets. Sprinkle with the salt, if you wish. Bake until the breadsticks are golden brown, about 10 to 15 minutes. Transfer the warm breadsticks to a basket and serve. ; name: good morning casserole ; ingredients: bread, sausage, eggs, evaporated milk, water, cheddar cheese, dry mustard, salt ; preparation:Spray 9 x 13 pan with cooking spray. Line pan with bread quarters. Cut sausage into small pieces as you brown it. Drain. In marge mixing bowl combine cooked sausage, eggs, evaporated mild, water, cheese, mustard, and salt. Pour over bread. Refrigerate at least 4 hours or overnight. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 - 60 minutes. Can be served with salsa. ; name: cheddar quick bread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, applesauce, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, dried dill ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees celcius. Add salt and cheese to flour. Add milk and mix well. Spray a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick spray. Spoon the mixture equally amongst the 12 cups. Bake till browned on the top. In a small bowl pour stuffing mix and water. Open chicken breasts, and if they are too thick to fold in half flatten and stretch them by placing on cutting board and using heavy rolling pin roll out chicken until it is able to be folded in half. Give the stuffing a quick mix with a spoon. Spoon stuffing onto one half of the chicken and fold chicken breast over to cover. Place breasts in baking pan. Spread over chicken breasts. name: garlicky baked fish ; ingredients: white fish fillet, whole milk, butter, paprika, dry breadcrumbs, garlic, parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Simmer for 2 mins, then pour into a jug and keep warm. Cook the apples in half the remaining butter for 5-10 mins until softened. Drain the potatoes and mash well with the rest of the butter and the milk. Fold in the apple, then serve with the sausages and onion gravy. ; name: baked sweet savory mashed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, salt, sweet potatoes in syrup, cream cheese, bacon, sour cream, chicken broth, pepper ; preparation:Bring potatoes, 1 teaspoon salt, and water to cover to a boil. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: italian style baked salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillet, fresh oregano, garlic, pepper, plum tomatoes, onion, fresh parsley, dry breadcrumbs, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Heat 1 t oil in a ovenproof skillet until it just shimmers. Add the salmon skin side down and cook until the skin begins to crisp, about 2-3 minutes. Mound the salt around and over each piece, trying to get it to really make a cohesive crust on each one. Roast in oven for 5 minutes per inch of thickness. Remove the salmon from the oven and let sit for 2 minutes in the crust. Carefully brush away the salt. Transfer to a clean work surface and finish removing salt with a pastry brush. Season with a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, and serve with a little lemon. The salmon will seem a little dry but will not be overcooked. This really brings out the flavor of the salmon. ; name: salmon with bacon and mushrooms ; ingredients: olive oil, salmon fillets, smoked bacon, red onion, button mushrooms, lemon zest, red wine vinegar, rosemary, sugar ; preparation:Heat grill to medium-high heat. Using aluminum foil, create an oblong cooking tray to be placed directly on grill. Place salmon fillet in center of tray. Season first with garlic salt, sprinkle with brown sugar, and then cover with pieces of butter. Top with sliced red onions. Pour beer of choice into tray to just below the highest point of the fillet. Cover tray with aluminum foil to envelope fish completely. Pour ; name: asian glazed salmon ; ingredients: brown sugar, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, ginger, dried red pepper flakes, garlic, fresh lime juice, salmon fillets ; preparation:Place the sugar, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, ginger, a dash of red pepper flakes, garlic and lime juice in a nonreactive saucepan. Place the salmon on a broiler pan and baste with the sauce. Let sit for 15 minutes. Broil them until cooked through, about 8 minutes, basting again with the glaze. Remove the salmon from the heat and baste once more with the glaze before serving. ; name: oriental style salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillets, vegetable oil, light soy sauce, honey, fresh ginger, green onions, lime, juice and zest of, black pepper, lime wedge ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine the butter, white wine, lemon juice, garlic, and parsley. When the butter melts completely, remove from heat. Arrange shrimp in a shallow baking dish. Pour the butter mixture over the shrimp. Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes or until the shrimp are pink and opaque. Serve over rice or pasta. ; name: famous red lobster shrimp scampi ; ingredients: medium shrimp, pure olive oil, garlic, white wine, fresh lemon, italian seasoning, butter, parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat cast iron skillet and add olive oil. Add shrimp and cook until tender and no longer translucent, reduce heat. Remove shrimp and set aside. Add garlic and cook 2-3 minutes. Do not allow garlic to brown - it will make it bitter. Add white wine, and lemon juice. Cook until wine is reduced by half. After it is reduced, add italian seasoning. Reduce heat to low, and add butter. If pan is too hot, the butter will separate. Add shrimp back into sauce, add parsley, and season to taste with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese. ; name: easy lemon dijon shrimp scampi ; ingredients: large shrimp, fresh garlic, butter, dried chili pepper flakes, dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, fresh parsley, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook and stir shrimp, garlic and chili flakes in butter in a large skillet over medium heat, until shrimp are pink and cooked. Delicious. ; name: shrimp scampi pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, large shrimp, garlic cloves, hot red pepper flakes, dry white wine, salt, black pepper, unsalted butter, capellini, fresh flat-leaf parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. name: leek and potato pie ; ingredients: potatoes, leeks, flour, salt and pepper, nutmeg, milk, butter ; preparation:Peel the potatoes and slice thinly. Wash the leeks thoroughly and slice thinly discarding about the last 2 inches of the green tops. Mix together the flour, salt, pepper and nutmeg. Grease a casserole dish. Put in alternate layers of potatoes and leeks sprinkling each layer with the seasoned flour and small chips of butter. The top layer should be potatoes. Dot the top with butter, pour hot milk on top of the casserole. Bake in the oven uncovered for about 1 hour. ; name: leeks baked with cream bacon and bay leaves ; ingredients: butter, leeks, chicken stock, white wine, cream, streaky bacon, fresh bay leaves, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Beat the eggs with the goat cheese, yogurt, and half the parmesan cheese. Season well with salt and pepper. Pour the cheese and yogurt mixture over the leeks. Mix the breadcrumbs with the remaining parmesan cheese, and sprinkle over the sauce. Finely grate half the rind from the lemon and then from the orange into the bowl. Squeese the juice from half of the lemon and then from half of the orange and add it to the ginger in the mixing bowl. Stir in the sour cream or yogurt and set the dressing aside. Peel the carrots and grate them into a serving bowl, then drain the sultanas and add them. Stir the dressing into the carrots and sultana mixture, then season with salt and add honey or sugar to taste. Refrigerate overnight, at least, until ready to use. Serve with any oriental meal, or eat as a snack anytime. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: baked caramel popcorn ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, corn syrup, salt, baking soda, vanilla, popped popcorn ; preparation:Prehead oven to 250f. Place entire bag of popcorn twists into a large roaster. In a large saucepan, cook together butter, brown sugar and corn syrup for 2 minutes after butter has melted and it starts to gently boil. Add baking soda to mixture. This will cause mixture to foam - that is why you need a large saucepaan. Allow to foam to cook down slightly. Pour caramel mixture over popcorn twists and stir until mixed. Place in oven for 35-45 minutes,, stirring at least every 10-15 minutes. Remove from oven and pour on wax paper. Allow to cool slightly and break apart. ; name: caramel popcorn balls ; ingredients: popped popcorn, sugar, brown sugar, light corn syrup, water, white vinegar, salt, butter ; preparation:Preheat your oven to 250. Melt 1 cup of butter over medium heat. Mix in brown sugar, corn syrup and sea salt and then stir until boiling at the edges. Lower the heat slightly and let boil until the caramel is 250. Remove from heat and add the baking soda and bourbon. Once fully incorporated, stir in the bacon. Divide the popcorn into two very lightly greased roasting pans and coat with the caramel. Mix well and then put the popcorn into the preheated oven for about 45 minutes to an hour, mixing every 10-15 minutes so the kernels of popped corn is coated in bourbon bacon coating. Once done, pour onto either parchment paper or wax paper to cool and break into pieces. Refrigerate. ; name: baked caramel corn ii ; ingredients: butter, baking soda, brown sugar, vanilla, corn syrup, popped popcorn, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. name: country ham quiche ; ingredients: pie shells, eggs, half-and-half, ham, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, black pepper, ground red pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease 8 or 9 inch pie plate. Mix eggs in large bowl. Add shredded cheeses, folding. Fold in milk. Add salt and pepper to taste and any other spice to taste. Add any meats or veggies at this time, fold gently. Pour into pie plate and spread out. Bake for about 40 minutes. ; name: quiche pastry ; ingredients: cream cheese, butter, all-purpose flour, salt ; preparation:Mash together cream cheese and butter. Sprinkle in flour and salt. Mash with a fork until they are just tiny grains. Then knead only once or twice, until it just comes together. Place mixture in buttered bowl, seal with plastic wrap, and refrigerate 3-4 hours or overnight. Roll between 2 pieces of wax paper an hour before using. Fit the pan, crimp edges, and freeze at least 45 minutes. Jab holes in it with a fork and bake in a 400 degree oven for 6-7 minutes. Remove from oven and cool. Proceed with usual quiche recipe. ; name: no crust crab quiche ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, crabmeat, milk, eggs, all-purpose flour, salt, pepper, green onion ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9-inch pie pan with cooking spray. Mix together the milk, eggs, flour, salt, pepper, and green onions. Arrange the cheese evenly over the bottom of the pie pan. Top with the crab meat. Pour the egg mixture evenly over the cheese and crab. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. ; name: quick crustless quiche ; ingredients: cheese, bacon, broccoli, onion, eggs, flour, butter, salt, milk ; preparation:If using frozen, thaw and drain thoroughly. name: pumpkin cream soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, curry powder, flour, chicken broth, canned pumpkin, brown sugar, nutmeg, salt, milk ; preparation:Saute onion in butter. Add curry powder and flour. Cook until bubbly. Add other ingredients. Simmer. Garnish with chives or parsley. ; name: pumpkin tomato cream soup ; ingredients: tomatoes, butter, onion, cooked pumpkin, chicken broth, dry sherry, salt, pepper, dried tarragon, heavy cream ; preparation:In a large pot filled with boiling water, blanch tomatoes for 10 seconds. With a slotted spoon, transfer tomatoes to colander to cool. Peel, seed and quarter tomatoes. In a medium frying pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until golden, 4-5 minutes. In a blender or food processor, puree tomatoes, onion, pumpkin and broth until smooth. Transfer to a large saucepan. Add sherry, salt, pepper and tarragon. Cover and simmer, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes. Add cream and heat through, about 3 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: wendy s pumpkin soup ; ingredients: pumpkin, potato, sweet potato, onions, curry powder, cumin, garlic, chicken stock ; preparation:In a large pot filled with boiling water, blanch potatoes for 10 seconds. With a slotted spoon, transfer potatoes to colander to cool. Peel, seed and quarter potatoes. In a medium frying pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until golden, 4-5 minutes. In a blender or food processor, puree potatoes, onion, pumpkin and broth until smooth. Transfer to a large saucepan. Add sherry, salt, pepper and tarragon. Cover and simmer, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes. Add cream and heat through, about 3 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: pumpkin wild rice soup ; ingredients: onion, butter, chicken broth, pumpkin, wild rice, white pepper, heavy cream, fresh chives ; preparation:Saut the onion in the butter in a large saucepan for 5 minutes. <|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|><|endoftext|>name: baked shrimp appetizers ; ingredients: mushrooms, small shrimp, dry breadcrumbs, egg, milk, lemon juice, onion, seasoning salt, butter ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except shrimp in a mixing bowl to make batter. name: snack pizza spread ; ingredients: margarine, onion, mushroom pieces, green pepper, celery, parsley, pizza sauce, tomato paste, sharp cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Fry onions in butter in a small sauce pan. Add mushrooms, green peppers, celery, parsley and any other vegetable you may want to add. Add pizza sauce, tomato paste, cheeses and spices. Keeps for a couple of weeks in the fridge if sealed. Grease a 13x9x2 inch pan. Unroll dough. Press in bottom and 1 inch up sides of greased pan. Fold the 1 inch of dough over and around the cheese. Press dough edges to seal. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15 to 18 minutes or until crust is golden brown and cheese is melted. ; name: garlic pizza wedges ; ingredients: bread pizza crust, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, red onion, garlic, dried oregano ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees.
